DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murdering rival
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I wish they could still be here. To see how much I'm enjoying myself now, after ending their miserable life...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murder spree
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Nothing could stop me. Murder. Everyone.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about torturing
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Stranger tied up in front of me. Set of shiny and sharp tools on the table. I grabbed one of the knifes and I couldn't stop. Even when strangers body stopped quivering, I was still taking pleasure in the simple act of torture...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about murder
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Motionless body lays in front of me and I watch it. The blood pool keeps getting bigger. I don't remember why I killed this person but it feels so damn good.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about fighting
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: Breaking their bones is not enough! Let the blood spill!
